short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for text rephrasing. Use multiple llm and custom shortcuts. Enhances efficiency for professionals and creators

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shortcut GPT is an advanced browser extension that revolutionizes text interaction through AI-powered rephrasing and intelligent prompt management. Key features include:

• Multi-Provider AI Support: Configure and switch between multiple AI providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, Ollama) seamlessly
• Customizable Keyboard Shortcuts: Create personalized keyboard shortcuts for instant text transformation
• Flexible Prompt Templates: Design custom prompt templates to suit your specific writing and communication needs
• Context-Aware Text Rephrasing: Instantly rephrase selected text with a single keyboard shortcut
• Secure Configuration: Safely store and manage API keys for different AI providers
• Adaptive Model Selection: Choose from multiple AI models within each provider

Ideal for writers, developers, content creators, and professionals seeking to enhance their writing efficiency and creativity.
